title: Eras lookalike font - no slant, no pinched shapes
content:
I have seen this font before but all that I can figure is that it is a knockoff

It looks exactly like eras but without the slant and all versions of eras I've seen have slightly pinched letterforms. The I for instance is a rectangle with straight sides, yet on Eras the sides are curved in a bit.

Has anyone seen this before?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018205515im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bbbb_5060.jpg)
author: vector
